nameEntry.part: Records of The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton
The Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters

biogHist.abstract: The collection Records of the Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton includes admission cards for 1957 to 1986 with some gaps. It also contains historical records and photographs.
biogHist.p: Care leavers can apply to the Salvation Army for information and records about their time in care.

A two page application form will need to be completed. The form will ask for contact details, personal and family information to assist with a record search and identification. The application requests copies of a drivers licence and birth certificate or 100 points of identification. Those who don't have enough official documents can ask the Care Leavers of Australia Network (CLAN) or the Find & Connect Support Service to confirm their identity to the Salvation Army.
Those applying for information about a third party will need consent from that person or the executor of their estate.

In 2014, the Salvation Army provided information to the Find & Connect web resource about records in their collection relating to The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton. In addition to the admission records, the collection includes:

cpfRelation.relationEntry: The Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters (2012 - )
Fullarton [Admission Cards], Salvation Army Girls' Home (1967 - 1986)
Fullarton [Admission Cards], Salvation Army Girls' Home (1963 - 1964)
Fullarton [Admission Cards], Salvation Army Girls' Home (1957 - 1964)
Fullarton [Admission Cards], Salvation Army Girls' Home (1959)
The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton (1945 - 1969?)
The Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters - Contact Details
Territorial Social Programme branch of The Salvation Army (? - 2012)

descriptiveNote.p: The Records of the Salvation Army Girls Home Fullarton were held by the Territorial Social Programme branch of the Salvation Army. In 2012 the Territorial Social Programme branch of the Salvation Army changed its name to the Salvation Army Australian Southern Territory Territorial Headquarters.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Records of The Salvation Army Girls' Home, Fullarton', in Find & Connect - South Australia,
